Package model.binary_tree

Class BinaryTree<T>

java.lang.Object
model.binary_tree.BinaryTree<T>
Type Parameters:
T - The type of data stored in the tree.
public class BinaryTree<T> extends Object
The BinaryTree class represents a binary tree data structure.
